definitions.definition: ( games , British ) A two-player cue sport played with two cue balls and one red ball, on a snooker sized table.
examples: He was playing billiards in the casino.

definitions.definition: ( games , US ) Any of various games played on a tabletop , usually with several balls, one or more of which is hit by a cue .

main_definition: ( games , British ) A two-player cue sport played with two cue balls and one red ball, on a snooker sized table.
secondary_definitions: ( games , US ) Any of various games played on a tabletop , usually with several balls, one or more of which is hit by a cue .
